title: Olympic National Park: Campground Status
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping     Camping     Campground Status                Campground Status       Campgrounds may close on short notice due to weather or unsafe conditions. Call (360)565-3130 for the most current  information.       Campground Status Comments AltairClosed Closed indefinitely due to flood damage Deer ParkOpen Primitive.  No potable water in summer. DosewallipsOpen Walk-in only. Road washed out 5.5 miles from campground. ElwhaClosedClosed indefinitely due to flood damage FairholmeOpen Graves CreekOpen Walk-in only. Road washed out 2 miles from campground.  No potable water. Heart O'the HillsOpen  HohOpen  KalalochOpen  MoraOpen North ForkOpenPrimitive.  No potable water. Ozette Open QueetsOpenAccessible only from Upper Queets Valley Road. Sol DucOpen South BeachOpen StaircaseOpen       Check Operating Hours and Seasons for current campground opening and closing dates.
